title: parivOD-enakkaruL
sahitya:
parivOD-enakkaruL purivAi murugA


anupallavi

  ariyAmal aDiyEn purindiTTa pizhaigaL anaittaiyum poruttu unaduLLam urugum


caraNam    purinda pizhaikkellAm varundi ini mEl avai purindiDAdadu tirunda virumbi nAn
serinda perumaiyODu cendUril amarndiDum semmalE undanaDi kumbiDa varumpOdu
